title: Oshitai Shite Orimasu.
alternative_title: 推したいしております。
status: 推したいしております。
description:
Description :
        On the day of a matchmaking interview between distinguished families... Riko wanted to call it off because she's in love with her Oshi, while her counterpart Taiyou was also aiming to call it off because of his fear of women! However, they're both able to value what the other "loves" and come to an understanding, so they decide to pretend to be dating in order to deceive their parents!? This is the start of your new favorite Handcraft Boy x Yumejoshi Girl Fake Love Lifestyle♪
